summary: This module defines the core neural components of the HiFi‑GAN vocoder for text‑to‑speech, including a generator network, multi‑period and multi‑scale discriminators, residual blocks, and helper utilities for weight‑normalization handling, all wrapped as NeMo NeuralModules with explicit input/output type specifications.
business_intent: To supply the building blocks needed to train and run a high‑fidelity neural vocoder within the NVIDIA NeMo TTS framework, enabling realistic speech waveform synthesis through adversarial learning.
